basics.name: SE Business Development Manager
basics.label: Manager
basics.summary: Resolution-oriented manager with an established track record of exceptional sales results and cross-cultural sales background. Exceptional multi-tasker with excellent communication skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for Own Brand business development in the southeast U.S. including NC, SC, GA, FL, AL,VA, MS, AL, WV, VA, KY and TN. Supporting Lewis-Goetz, Rawson, and ICD offices and sales reps to pursue opportunities for Own Brand products.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Technical support for the Outside Sales Representative's in Southeast. Engineering presentations and specifications for manual and automated valves to engineering firms.
